column2: Role:  Communications Strategist, Founders Office Location : Gurgaon Experience : Min 2-3 Years   About the role As a Strategy and Networking Specialist in the Founders Office, you will have the unique opportunity to work directly with Josh Talks CEO Supriya Paul. Your role will focus on elevating their stature as thought leaders through strategic networking, aligning speaking engagements, and curating content that resonates with a distinguished audience. This position requires a blend of strategic planning, networking skills, and content development acumen. Key Responsibilities Strategic Networking and Relationship Building: Forge and nurture strategic relationships with key industry leaders, potential collaborators, and influential figures to bolster the co-founders??network. Speaking Engagement Alignment: Identify, vet, and secure speaking opportunities at events that align with the co-founders??expertise and audience. Develop strategies to amplify the impact of these engagements. Content Strategy Development: Collaborate with the co-founders to develop content strategies that position them as thought leaders in their industry. This includes keynote speeches, articles, and thought leadership pieces. Execution of Content Strategy: Oversee the creation and dissemination of content across various platforms, ensuring it aligns with strategic goals and communicates the co-founders??insights effectively. Event Preparation and Management: Prepare all necessary materials for speaking engagements, including presentations and talking points. Coordinate logistics and ensure smooth execution of events. Team Leadership: Lead and mentor a team of copywriters and content creators to produce high-quality, strategic content. Performance Analysis: Regularly review and analyze the effectiveness of networking strategies and content, adjusting plans as necessary to maximize impact. Requirements Strategic Vision: Ability to think strategically and execute plans that align with the co-founders??goals and vision. Networking Skills: Proven ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and influencers. Content Creation and Strategy: Experience in developing and implementing content strategies that elevate brand and individual profiles. Communication and Storytelling: Exceptional writing and storytelling skills, with the ability to adapt tone and style to match different audiences and platforms. Organizational Skills: Meticulous organization and project management skills, with a structured approach to planning and executing tasks. Innovative and Resourceful: Demonstrated ability to be innovative, resourceful, and proactive in identifying and pursuing new opportunities. Collaborative Mindset: Strong ability to work across functions and levels, balancing multiple stakeholders??priorities. Qualities we value Curiosity and Engagement: A deep desire to understand and connect with people, using insights to create value for them. Adaptability: Comfortable working in a fast-paced, flexible environment, with the ability to handle ambiguity and take decisive action. Entrepreneurial Spirit: An entrepreneurial mindset, characterized by a high tolerance for ambiguity, a bias towards action, and the drive to continuously improve. Leadership: Ability to inspire and motivate others, fostering a culture of excellence and innovation. About the Founders Supriya and Shobhit co-founded Josh Talks in 2015, while they were still in college, with a shared objective ??to offer a supportive environment to the youth that allows them to unlock their inherent but untapped potential. Today, Josh Talks runs India?? largest network of non-entertainment channels on YouTube in 10 Indian languages and 8 categories. Their online community has grown to 25 Million and their content is viewed over 100 Million times a month. Their android app has 450,000+ paying learners who spend more than 50 minutes on the app every single day, overcoming their hesitation of speaking in English. Owing to the success of the organization, Supriya and Shobhit were recognised in the Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia List in 2018. Supriya was recognised by NITI Aayog at the Women Transforming India Awards 2021 and by Forbes as one of the top ??0 Self Made Women??in India in 2020.

column2: Skill required:Finance Processes and Operations - Finance Strategy  Designation:Management Level - Analyst  Job Location:Gurugram  Qualifications:Any Graduation/BCom  Years of Experience:3 to 5 years  What would you do? "You will be aligned with our Finance Operations vertical and will be helping us in determining financial outcomes by collecting operational data/reports, whilst conducting analysis and reconciling transactions. The team aligns Finance with Business Strategy in order to maximize operational efficiency and effectiveness by harnessing the power of robotics to accelerate transaction processing, with AI to provide analysis and commentary and machine learning deployed for matching and reconciliations This team is responsible for leading the transformation agenda for our clients by helping them improve finance function performance within the context of their organizations' strategies. The team leads growth and mining in existing F&A accounts for industry segments. This team works across Procure to Pay (PTP), Record to Report (RTR), Order to cash (OTC), Finance Processes (FPNA), Tax and Treasury towers to provide best in the class industry view, support existing engagements, diagnostic, due diligence, client co-design workshops, transformation engagement, drive existing client portfolios. The team works on Industry Digital F&A technologies&leading tools, automation, AI, and Analytics."  What are we looking for? " Ability to establish strong client relationship  Ability to perform under pressure  Adaptable and flexible  Detail orientation  Problem-solving skills " Roles and Responsibilities " In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower-complexity problems  Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors  In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management  You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments  The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts"Location: pune

column1: Creative Layout Artist & Director For Kids' Mag - UK Company , WFH
column2: Are you a Creative Layout Artist and Director with a passion for sparking creativity in young minds?  Do you have a proven track record of crafting captivating layouts and illustrations for kids' magazines? If so, we want you to lead our talented team as we inspire and educate the next generation of readers!  Flexible working conditions including work from home or as freelance. About Us: We are a UK based leading educational content provider dedicated to enhancing children's learning experiences through creative and interactive materials. Our mission is to make learning enjoyable and accessible for children of all ages, helping them develop essential skills while having fun. Role Overview:   As the Creative Layout Artist and Director, you will oversee the visual direction and production of our kids' magazine. You will lead a team of talented artists and designers, guiding them to create visually stunning layouts and illustrations that captivate our young audience. Working closely with the editorial team, you will ensure our content is not only visually appealing but also educational and age-appropriate. Key Responsibilities: Directing the overall visual style and design of the magazine, from cover to cover. Leading and mentoring a team of layout artists and illustrators to produce high-quality work that meets our standards of excellence. Collaborating with writers, editors, and other stakeholders to ensure visual and editorial content align seamlessly. Managing project timelines and production schedules to meet publication deadlines. Staying abreast of industry trends and best practices to continually elevate the quality of our magazine. Requirements: Proven experience working on kids' magazines, with a strong portfolio showcasing your creative layouts and illustrations. Proficiency in industry-standard design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Strong leadership and communication skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate a team. A deep understanding of children's interests, developmental stages, and visual preferences. A passion for storytelling and a commitment to creating content that educates and inspires young readers. How to Apply:   If you're ready to lead our team in creating impactful content that shapes the minds of tomorrow, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and examples of your work demonstrating your experience with kids' magazines.

column2: We are looking for an Academic Content Developer to join our team and create academic content in the format of presentations for our courses. Academic Content Developer responsibilities include conducting thorough research on industry-related topics, generating ideas for new content types, and creating and proofreading content before delivery along with creating content for multiple platforms including website, email, and WhatsApp under the guidance of the reporting manager. Ultimately, you'll deliver quality presentations that help in training our students in important digital marketing concepts. If you're familiar with producing educational content and have an eye for detail, wed like to meet you. Share samples of your work or portfolio of your published works, along with your application. Responsibilities Develop and generate high-quality educational material in the form of presentations focusing on digital marketing topics to meet key learning objectives.  Conduct research over the internet (combining online sources, interviews and studies) and develop academic contents accordingly.  Work closely with in-house & external subject matter experts to ensure accuracy & relevance.  Conduct own research to further understand learners requirements.  Ensure that learning material is concise, easy to follow, and well-formatted. Be involved in curriculum development and educational material development activities. Be innovative and creative in the use of language, graphics, animations, interactions, audio, video, and any other elements used in the presentations. Design the content & presentations keeping in mind the format (online/offline) & duration of training sessions.  Ensure that the content is up-to-date by researching the latest trends and best practices across digital platforms. Attend classroom training at regular intervals to understand how the content is being delivered and make incremental changes to the modules based on learnings. Innovate and improve on presentation building skills to enhance the learning experience. Create MCQs, assignments & other test material to be used as post-test material basis the module created. Proofread and edit before training sessions. Submit work to manager for input and approval. Coordinate with various departments as and when required to ensure all-round consistency. Requirements Should be extremely comfortable with making PowerPoint presentations Should be sensitive towards the ability of students and beginners to grasp new concepts Experience doing research using multiple sources Excellent writing and editing skills in English Familiarity with marketing web publications  Attention to detail, ability to multitask & meet deadlines Must have done a Digital Marketing course

column2: TTEC Digital is looking for Technical Proposal Writer, who will work with the sales and solutions architects team to respond to Requests for Proposal (RFP), Information (RFI), and Quote (RFQ) opportunities. You will also develop and maintain the answer library within the proposal management tool. The success of the role is measured by the impact on new client acquisition and proposal win rate.              What You Will Be Doing           ?       Respond to technical questions in Requests for Proposal (RFP), Request for Information (RFI), and Request for Quote (RFQ) documents (RFxs):       ?     - Participate in the evaluation of RFxs for TTEC fit, especially from a technology solution fit standpoint     - Use the current proposal management tool to automate the response process, track responses, and complete work assigned by Proposal Coordinator      - Help maintain the content library by reviewing/editing responses and adding new question/answer pairs, as needed, for the technical response domains     - Collaborate with Proposal Coordinator, Solutions Architects, and Innovation Architects, as well as CAMs and AEs, to create a technical response strategy and to research responses to questions to arrive at the best responses     - Collaborate with Solutions Architects to properly create pricing quotes for RFx responses     - Research responses in TTEC s non-production environments        Help with peer edits as necessary to ensure the quality of documentation produced by the team      Research and embrace innovative technologies and tools to improve RFx response quality and department productivity     Regularly collaborate with direct management along with other internal key stakeholders (Sales, Support, Services, Marketing) staff driving strategic business decisions for the achievement of desired goals and objectives.      Will provide work direction and achieve results working through direct management.          What You Bring to The Role         bachelors degree in a related area of study preferred (though equivalent experience will be considered). masters a plus      3 + years of technical writing and/or related project experience      Describe complex technical information clearly for intended audiences     Solid knowledge of the Genesys products, specifically Genesys Cloud, PureConnect, and Genesys Engage      High-level knowledge of typical customer-facing technologies (CRMs such as Salesforce and Dynamics 365, WFM, Speech/Interaction Analytics, Knowledge Management, Unified Communications - Teams, etc)      Excellent copyediting skills while being cognizant of the overall work process and timelines. Benefits available to eligible employees include      Best compensation, Health, and other benefits      A friendly work environment with flexible timings      Excellent opportunity to learn and explore new technologies     Assisting in training and certification programs

column2: The role    is a strategic one impacting customer experience and hence is at the core laying the foundation for the exceptional experience each of the customers have while interacting with the support org. The role contributes to preempting and continually identifying the customer needs to design the most efficient and effective processes to drive top class experience.                 Expectations         Pursue extensive data analysis, gather customer insights (VOCs) and identify possible failure points for processes which lead to issues and subsequent queries.        Design effective automation/manual process flows including Process journey mapping, SOP documentation, BOT journey with focus on providing an exceptional Customer Experience.        Prepare internal prioritization roadmaps basis the data/VOC analysis, work with different stakeholders to identify problem statements and scalable solutions       Drive stakeholder engagement across Product, Operations, Internal CX teams for all processes. Collaborate effectively to surface customer pain points, brainstorm for solutions, share updates etc       Act as the coordinator for all the process and customer support related requirements.       End-to-end accountability of the process flows, the conversational content to create an effortless and positive experience for the end users       Content writing for Indus Appstore - Consumer & for the developer platform     Draft and take ownership of all the help center content including FAQs, Error Messages etc with the intent to provide the end users with clear, simple and accurate information       Design and create content for Chatbots for Indus AppStore and Developer platform on new interaction models and deliver a customer experience that is par excellence       You will help improve how Indus interacts with consumers & developer partners and work with peers in Business, and Creative Tech to develop breakthrough interactive concepts and content strategies           Skills Required         Customer centricity - A natural inclination to think and act with customer first mindset. The process flows and content prepared would be to provide best-in-class support       Exceptional verbal and written communication skills - The role expects the individual to craft top class conversational content for the end users, actively participate and often lead conversations with stakeholders, communicate effectively across levels on the status updates, challenges, recommendations etc       Data Analysis and Problem solving skills - Comprehending data, deriving insights, inferring actionables are key to making progress and driving impact       Prioritization and Execution - Identifying problem statements and executing on deliverables is key to success in the role and so, skill to prioritize and ability to execute aggressively is of prime importance       Collaboration - Success in the role would come through strong interpersonal skills and collaborative abilities working with various stakeholders         Qualification       2 years experience in content writing, crafting videos/rich-media formats, and working with consumer internet products/apps     Deep understanding of customer psychology and is armed with strong narrative skills     A candidate who can cogently and passionately present and defend creative work/ideas, which improve customer experience     A communication specialist who can collaborate with multiple verticals/teams     Should be well versed with Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint and Word, and popular Content Management Systems     Experience in working with a customer experience team will be an advantage
